# Properties Professor - Real Estate Website

This is a full-stack real estate website with React frontend and Node.js/Express backend.

## Project Structure
- `backend/` - Node.js Express server with authentication and property APIs
- `frontend/` - React application with property listings and user interface

## Features
- User authentication (login/register)
- Property listings with demo data
- Search and filter properties
- Responsive navbar, hero section, and footer
- QR code in footer for feedback

## Technology Stack
- Frontend: React, CSS
- Backend: Node.js, Express, JWT authentication
- Database: In-memory (demo data)

## Development Instructions
- Use `npm install` in both frontend and backend directories
- Start backend: `cd backend && npm start`
- Start frontend: `cd frontend && npm start`
